indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX social_event_participants_pkey ON public.social_event_participants USING btree (event_id, user_id)

policies.policy_name: Allow delete on social_event_participants for users
Allow insert on social_event_participants for users
Allow select on social_event_participants for authenticated use
Allow update on social_event_participants for users

policies.with_check:
(auth.uid() IN ( SELECT social_events.created_by
   FROM social_events
  WHERE (social_events.id = social_event_participants.event_id)))

policies.policy_name: Users can update their own participation
policies.using:
((auth.uid() = user_id) OR (auth.uid() IN ( SELECT social_events.created_by
   FROM social_events
  WHERE (social_events.id = social_event_participants.event_id))))
